title: I am a American citizen, how long would it take me to bring my family to the usa? i mean my wife, 19 years old and son 6 months.
question: i am 21 years old and i want to bring my family to the us. i want to know how long would the process take.
answers:
Well, you should file for an I-130 petition first for them. Then the process will go to National visa center and as for your son, was he born before or after you became citizen. The entire process if done right, should take around 6 months to 1 year. I will advise you talk to a lawyer at least for a consultation to go over the various options

Good Luck
